Select language
Enter source code
Gutter
Hide gutter & line numbers
Controls
Hide code controls at the top of the code block.
Collapse
Collapse the code block by default. (controls need to be turned on)
Show columns
Show row columns in the first line.
Default line count
Will begin line count at value. Default value is 1.
     
NOTE:
This plugin makes use of the Java Script SyntaxHighlighter available from Google Code. Without configuring your website to use the SyntaxHighlighter this plugin will not have much affect!
